mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, p.name, p.unit_id, p.mobile, uu.name as unitname FROM `user` u left join person p on u.id = p.id left join unit uu on p.unit_id = uu.id WHERE u.id = #{id};
SELECT * FROM user U WHERE U.id = #{id};
select * from person p where p.id = #{id};

SELECT u.id, u.username,p.mobile, p.name, p.unit_id, p.is_deleted, uu.name as unitname FROM `user` u left join person p on u.person_id = p.id left join unit uu on p.unit_id = uu.id where u.usertype_id = 0;
SELECT u.id, u.username, p.name, p.unit_id, p.mobile, uu.name as unitname FROM `user` u left join person p on u.id = p.id left join unit uu on p.unit_id = uu.id WHERE u.id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM unit u WHERE u.id = #{id};

SELECT u.id, p.name,p.unit_id, uu.name as unit_name ,u.username, p.mobile,p.is_deleted FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN `person` p ON u.person_id = p.id LEFT JOIN `unit` uu ON p.unit_id = uu.id WHERE u.usertype_id !=1 ORDER by p.name ;
